main event: A resident observed an orange object in Morgantown, West Virginia, which was concluded to be a hot air balloon, as confirmed by local students releasing balloons.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10-15 seconds., The observed object was described as orange in color., A 7AA observer claimed students were releasing hot air balloons at the time., Local authorities recovered one of the balloons after it descended in a residential area., Subsequent FAA reports indicated similar low altitude sightings in the area.
witness description: one resident and a student observer
